Breeding male (American).description: Smaller than Wood Duck with a rounder head. Green-winged Teal lacks the Wood Duck's bold white striping, and is more solid gray on the breast and sides.

Female/nonbreeding male.description: Smaller than Wood Duck with a rounder head. Female teal lack white eye patch seen on female Wood Ducks.

Breeding male (Northern).description: Mallards have a rounder head than Wood Ducks and males do not have the ornate head pattern of Wood Ducks.

Female (Northern).description: Mallards have a rounder head than Wood Ducks. Females do not have the white eye patch seen on female Wood Ducks.

Breeding male.description: Hooded Mergansers have a longer, thinner bill than Wood Ducks. Males have a bold white patch on the head and a white breast that Wood Ducks lack.

Nonbreeding male.description: Hooded Mergansers have a longer, thinner bill than Wood Ducks and females lack the white eye patch.
